answers.reply: Oh yeah, it's totally yuge, berdie. The implications of this coming election will affect the rest of our lives!
I don't know, Berdie. I'm pretty sure that no matter who gets elected nothing will change. I mean, they're all just puppets for the shapeshifting reptilian overlords anyways.
Oh yeah, totally fine. If you are worried about toxins just drink some high-proof alcohol before, during and after. Wouldn't hurt to dump a little on your body afterwards too. Be careful though...
